So here's the deal with medical expenses and taxes, I literally just reviewed this info for something totally unrelated to medical cannabis. To deduct medical expenses you have to itemize AND those expenses have to be more than 7.5% of your adjusted gross income. This article explains things pretty well: [https://turbotax.intuit.com/tax-tips/health-care/can-i-claim-medical-expenses-on-my-taxes/L1htkVqq9](https://turbotax.intuit.com/tax-tips/health-care/can-i-claim-medical-expenses-on-my-taxes/L1htkVqq9) #8203; Also it has to make sense to itemize meaning that you have enough receipts to beat the normal standard deduction (12,200 for single files and 24,400 for married filing jointly) PLUS 7.5% of your AGI.

WRITING.TITLE: For you guys with fat fingers
WRITING.TEXT: Two years ago the doc that stitched up my hand, a fellow trout fisherman, gave me both sets of forceps and these long ass tweezers from the suture kit he used. For two years those tweezers sat in the back of glove box of my truck. Then last week as I was struggling to get at a bud in the bottom of a container I remembered those tweezers and they suddenly became a beloved piece of kit. I'm sharing this in case anyone else has something similar lying around collecting dust because they really are great for fishing buds out of these tiny containers. #8203; https://preview.redd.it/iye5e4mp4if41.jpg?width=3024 amp;format=pjpg amp;auto=webp amp;s=8a6d3c1f97804919964fb3e59d3548a92689d2d6
I definitely have one but I have to get the buds from the jar to the grinder somehow.

I mean you can, but dumping it knocks all the buds around and knocks off trichromes. Then you have to finger it all back up to put it back in the jar, losing more trichromes in that process. Repeat that enough times over smoking an 1/8th and your last bud is basically mexican ditch weed (just kidding of course). The idea is really to handle the bud as little as possible because those tiny little bits you're losing are the really good shit.
Me neither and we're in total agreement, but that particular jar of pyro rough cut all kind of sticks together so you gotta get a little aggressive when you dump it.

First things first Indica, Sativa, Hybrid: Indica strains are believed to be physically sedating, perfect for relaxing with a movie or as a nightcap before bed. Sativas are said to provide invigorating, uplifting cerebral effects that pair well with physical activity, social gatherings, and creative projects. Hybrids are thought to fall somewhere in between, offering a balance of indica and sativa effects. If you're here for anxiety, I'd reccomend starting with an indica to get yourself used to the effects. Also if you're nervous about trying cannabis anything with a 1:1 thc/cbd ratio could be a good starting point also because the cbd will tone down the psychoactive effects of the thc. Second Things Second Product categories: * Flower - Obviously flower form of cannabis can be smoked, but PA would prefer that you vaporize it. * Concentrates (Sugar, Wax, Diamonds, Sauce, Live Resin, whatever tf else they come up with) Some are dry and easy to work with some are sticky AF and not easy to work with. Typically Consumed with a dab pen or dab rig. See youtube for further instructions, people love to record themselves dabbing so there is not shortage of options there. * Not really for newbies I wouldn't suggest starting with concentrates. * Vape Cartridges Screw it onto a battery and away you go. * Disposables smaller version of above vape cartridge with permanently affixed battery. Bad for the environment, bad for your wallet (they're over priced), but good for people who don't want to spend a ton to try a few different things. * Edibles - capsules, rso, tinctures * Topicals - Lotions

Fly to colorado. You'll come back with a ton of concentrate for about the same price you'd pay around here. Example: Flight out of PIT 333.80 to DIA non stop. Found a deal for 8 grams of wax 100 bucks otd. So flight + 8 grams wax = 433.80 8 grams of the cheapest wax I've seen in PA \* 55 = 440 OR 16 half grams of frx concentrate \* 58 = 928 (lolloolloollllooolol I'll never buy anything from frx. Ever. Vote with your wallet.) Full disclosure I didn't even pick the cheapest flight (there was a spirit flight for a list price of 219).

During this crisis there is another path we can take from a pricing standpoint. The pa attorney generals office is investigating all reports of price gouging during the crisis. This probably won't apply to every dispensary, but if you see a product at one dispo going for higher than another dispo report them to the attorney general. I actually have an example. WRITING.TITLE: I don't see much liberty flower so here's this one. Rev in comments. Salmon River OG #3 Fishing Anyone?

WRITING.TEXT: The 8th weighed 3.6, PA growers seem to be figuring out how to use their scales. This is the second time I've had this strain from liberty. I liked it quite a bit the first time, but I scooped it on the way to camp and had to much fun to do a proper shoot and tell. * Second go round: Does. Not. Disappoint. * The smell is great, just straight lemony awesome. Opinions are like assholes and everyone has one, and my opinion is that this is one of the better (top 3) smelling strains I've had from the program. * Taste: Limonene scrapes by as the top terp and it shows a bit. Pretty bright flavor, no burny not quite properly dried or flushed bullshit taste. * Effects: This one is a strong buy IMHO (remember they're like assholes). The effects are great very indica and noticeable. * Overall 10/10 - 1 the whole 8th looks a bit small. +1 Dense nugs that taste great and don't come in a poop jar are awesome. 10/10 for 50 bucks at rise.

WRITING.TITLE: Pretty Flowers. Gratuitous Prime Shot Purple Haze #44 and #19. Explanation in comments.

WRITING.TEXT: These are both buds from prime's last flower drop. I was lucky enough to get an 8th of #44 (cotton candy) and a gram of #19 (choc lemon drop). I've been wanting to snap them side by side and ended up doing so while talking to a buddy this evening. The picture came out so well on the first try I couldn't not post it for you all. Mini review so as to provide some value beyond pretty pictures. Cotton candy smells like cotton candy to me, my wife (the cotton candy enthusiast) thought it smelled like hops. She doesn't know what she's talking about in this case. Choc Lemon didn't smell like much but did smoke nice. They're both purple haze and smoke like hybrids to me, not sedating or racy, but nice. Rating for me probably 7-8/10 on the 44 and 6-7/10 on the 19.
Nope I'm honestly not a big cart guy.

Some other folks may know better, but the major difference I see in the various concentrates is how hard or easy they are to work with. I prefer dryer concentrates wax, sugar wax, and budder are the three types I've tried so far. I've also tried cured sugar from rythm which was like trying to work with super glue, and from as ease of use standpoint that sucked. As far as smell it's probably going to be pretty variable from concentrate to concentrate based on terpene profile mostly. I'd be willing to bet that pure thca diamonds with a low terp profile probably just smell vaguely weedy like a cart. But even the higher terp profile concentrates that may smell more herby still really don't smell like weed proper PLUS you're vaping with that pen not combusting which would also reduce the odor and limit it's ability to hang around. Edit anecdotal evidence: I had some ice cream cake wax in a pen. I was hitting it standing on the side of the street in downtown pittsburgh at 930 am during the week so people were around. Not one person seemed to look at me or care.
The last couple terrapin batches have been not great imo so I've been avoiding them. But coffee ice cream is good and I like cherry diesel.

I do this on the regular. And i'll tell what concentrates have worked well ontop of flower or keif. Typically what I do is this: After my bowl has some ash in it I'll kind of compress the ash a bit and put a scoop of kief right on top of it. Then I'll take a bit of some concentrate and put that right on top of the kief. Next fire away being careful to flame the keif without hitting the concentrate, the kief will burn and basically burn up the concentrates. MUST BE DONE IN ONE HIT TO AVOID WASTING CONCENTRATE. What works: Badder, Budder, cresco live sugar, prime sugar wax, terrapin waxes and probably sugars (never had terrapin sugar), What doesn't: SAUCE (just stay away), rythm cured sugar (more like sauce and diamonds) What I don't know about: Live Resin, some of them look like they'd work some look like they wouldn't.

Mostly the terrapin flower has been ropy. And sometimes prime, the recent gram of legend of 91 was about 1.3 and 4 small buds. I haven't totally finished it yet, but I'd say half the hits I've taken taste great the other half were crappy tasting.

This is correct the patient database in pa is treated as personal health info and isn't accessible to other state agencies.

**In pa state parks be aware of your surroundings. And follow park rules ESP the quiet hours rule.** Years ago camping with friends at cooks forest state park there were 6-7 of us set up on a two sites right across from a family in a pop up camper. Everything was fine until WE violated quiet hours which triggered a mini shit storm. From the camp site I could see the vehicle entrance to the camp site area, and shortly after 10 I noticed a rangers vehicle come through the gate faster than would be normal for a routine patrol. I said hey guys I'm pretty sure he's on his way over here and thankfully he had to make a big loop before arriving at our camp site. I grabbed my weed and non chalantly stashed it back under some brush in the shadows before the ranger arrived. So we're good on weed at this point, my shit is hidden and ranger rick never knew; However, he was highly annoyed that we were **drinking (everyone was legal** ***but booze in state parks IS NOT*** **)** and **very highly annoyed that we'd disturbed the family across the way.** All of our booze was confiscated (except for a smartwater bottle filled with vodka) and we got yelled at for awhile about breaking the rules and threatened with fines, but since we were polite we got off with a warning and the confiscation our of booze. #8203; The rangers are generally pretty lax as long as you're respectful of others and mindful of the rules. Be discreet about alcohol and weed consumption and you'll have zero problems.

With a cold start my method is as follows: 1. Load Dab (try to center it in the banger) 2. Place carb cap atop banger 3. Fire torch and heat sides first (I'm applying heat to the bottom half of the banger) the reason for heating the sides first is that the oil will climb the cooler banger walls if you start from the center. 4. Once the dab in the center starts melting start heating the bottom, I usually kind of circle around the concentrate in the center. 5. When the concentrate starts bubbling it's ready kill the torch and hit that bad boy. I never use a timer I purely go by the look of the concentrate. Definitely check some youtube vids of people doing them them. And one last thing to mention is that cold starts do waste a little more material.

Well honestly to me it seriously effects the taste and smell of the bud. Cannabis that isn't partly hermed will taste better, smell better, and have better effects. Think of it like this: You can go grab a keystone ice and a southern tier nu juice they'll both give you pretty equal effects but one is undeniably better. What pisses people off is paying keystone prices for southern tier.

gt;Do you find herm holes produce a subtle off flavor like something went wrong in a brewing process that is undesired, or is it more offensive like the beer skunked? In my opinion it can be both depending on how bad the bud is. The holes themselves aren't really the problem, they're only empty voids. The problem is the part of the plant surrounds the hole is like a little seed husk and they don't taste very good (esp when smoked). The other problem with the little seed husks is that the process of seed creation is pretty energy expensive for the plant. When that starts to happen the plant stops producing all the stuff we like and starts to attempt to self propagate like a raptor from jurrasic park. Is there still good stuff in there when they whack these plants down, sure, but every bud with a hole in it is a bud that could have been better.
It's actually more like they cut the plants a little early before the seeds fully develop.

WRITING.TITLE: Packaging question for the math inclined among us.
WRITING.TEXT: You buy a 1g tube of RSO, does that RSO (proudct only) actually weigh 1 gram? The syringes are labeled in ml's at least the ones I've seen which can't be directly converted to grams without density. My reason for posing this question is this: it makes the dosing math strange how do you get from ml's to mg's per ml without density? And then are the thc and terp percentages based on weight (g's) or volume (ml's)?
83 something.
That's assuming a density of 1.0 g/ml
So your math ASSUMES there is 1000mg's or 1 gram of product in that tube. Actual weight of the oil isn't listed anywhere. Water weighs 1 gram per ml do RSO and water weigh the same?
No one tells you what the mass is though.
gt;1 gram is equal to 1 ML as well as 1000 MG. It is absolutely not in the case of RSO it can't be.
Thanks bud I do appreciate your input. Have a great day.
No idea who downvoted you, but we're both right.
I'm thinking it might be easier to just squirt .1 ml's onto my scale and scale up from there. I just have a hard time believing that RSO and water have the same density.
I'm just curious.
No what I have is a syringe with one mil of liquid in it.
If rso is more dense than water massively more dense than water why would the syringe still have one mil of liquid in it?
Holy fuck dude no. 1 ml of water weighs 1 gram. 1 ml of etoh weighs .785 grams. They're not the same.
You are talking about weight when you're talking about miliGRAMS
